channel.title: How To Fix Lagg?
channel.description: Sup everyone! I'm wondering how to fix lagg on my server. I have Void-Pkz source. It seems, the more people join, the laggier it gets? Does anyone know how to fix this? Rep++ for a working answer! Thanks! :D

item.title: How To Fix Lagg?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Yeah =\

And the fact EVERYTHING is in client.java, is lame.

WinterLove server’s can be fixed and sped up… but it’s a waste of time. Since people who use them don’t know conventions or have the knowledge to create there own things. (There are a few exceptions to who knows, but uses wL)

[quote=“mr luigi 77, post:11, topic:242493”]Cody can u Rep+ me…
I would appreciate it…’
I will Rep++…
To you…
I just need 15 reps…
Thanks!
:D[/quote]

Yeah we know you need 15 rep.

Talking about rep is not allowed. So I suggest stop talking about it unless you want a punishment.

Read full topic

item.title: How To Fix Lagg?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

On another topic

Well, there are MANY things that cause wL based servers to lag. Thread-per-client, useless waste of code, like when someone executes a command, it revises ALL the posibilities, since no command returns, and no one knows the use of ‘else statements’.

Don’t forget the HUGE process…

Read full topic

item.title: How To Fix Lagg?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“Coder xynt, post:1, topic:242515”][quote author=Bryanc link=topic=318835.msg2527617#msg2527617 date=1226275065]
I got one…

Learn Java, Don’t use WinterLove.

That will help you out.
[/quote]Stop telling everyone to learn Java, when you don’t know the language yourself. This is the help section, you’re supposed to help, not tell everyone to go learn Java, and produce more spam.

Reported.[/quote]

How would you know what I know?

Oh that’s right… you don’t!

I thought so…

Well anyways, I know this is the help section. That’s exactly what I am doing. Learn Java and don’t use Winterlove is a great way to decrease Lag in a server.

So go suck a dick.

Read full topic
